Description: Foot sherd with turn of stem of Attic black-glazed pottery cup(?); wholly glaze save for narrow band at edge of stand-ring; ligature incised on same.
Curator's comments: This may rather be a rim, in view of the near full glazing, unusual on cups.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 502)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2080)
